scripts.install:deps: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm install
scripts.clear:deps: rm -rf server/node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.deps: npm run clear:deps && npm run install:deps
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run --prefix client dev" "npm run --prefix server dev"
scripts.pull:deploy: git pull origin main && npm ci
